# Query

Statin SNOMED codes were identified by:

- Children of statin-containing products (i.e. children of `96302009`, "Substance with 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme A reductase inhibitor mechanism of action (substance)")

::: {.column-screen-inset}
```{r}
#| code-fold: false
#| output: false
CHILDREN_PRODUCT_CONTAINING_STATIN = CHILDREN("96302009 << Product containing 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme A reductase inhibitor (product) >>")
RESULT = CHILDREN_PRODUCT_CONTAINING_STATIN
```
:::

      filterable = TRUE,

      paginationType = "jump",

)
